title: Bitcoin Rejects Test of All-Time Highs, A Double Top in the Making?
description: This weekend saw some explosive buying in digital assets, propulsed by Ethereum breaking above its previous highs. After touching $4,000, a cascade of Saturday buying took the second largest crypto to $4,350 highs. Ether is now consolidating around the $4,200 key handle â€“ A consolidation at its highs is a more bullish sign, however for […]The post Bitcoin Rejects Test of All-Time Highs, A Double Top in the Making? appeared first on Action Forex.
